text: Evgeny Donskoy was the defending champion but chose not to defend his title. Luca Vanni won the title after defeating Illya Marchenko 6–4, 3–6, 6–3 in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== * Main Draw * Qualifying Draw Open Castilla y Leon - Singles 2016
title: 2016 Open Castilla y León – Men's Singles
